posts.post_content:
Here is a real oddity.  This is a Series 8 miscut of Alabama sport HOFer, Del Pratt.  In addition to a decent baseball career, the second baseman was a star player for the Crimson Tide.  He is pictured as a member of the Montgomery Climbers.

The card is miscut in a way that it shows an entirely white panel above the orange border.  This is exceedingly rare.

$SOLD postpaid in the continental U.S.

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
